author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 20, 2020
description: B.C.'s Minister of Public Safety Mike Farnworth announced on Sunday that the province will issue $2,000 tickets for price gouging and for people who don't self-quarantine when they return from travelling.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry will give an update on COVID-19 cases in B.C. at 3 p.m.
  • Police now have the power to issue $2,000 fines for reselling and gouging prices for medical supplies.
